상위직

상위직 offer a new form of multiclassing. Unlike the basic classes, characters must meet Requirements before they can take their first level of 상위직. The rules for level advancement apply to this system, meaning the first step of advancement is always choosing a class. If a character does not meet the Requirements for 상위직 before that first step, that character cannot take the first level of that 상위직.  Taking 상위직 does not incur the experience point penalties normally associated with multiclassing.

용어 정의

Here are definitions of some terms used in this section.

Base Class: One of the standard eleven classes.

Caster Level: Generally equal to the number of class levels (see below) in a spellcasting class. Some 상위직 add caster levels to an existing class.

Character Level: The total level of the character, which is the sum of all class levels held by that character.

Class Level: The level of a character in a particular class. For a character with levels in only one class, class level and character level are the same.

비전 궁수

Hit Die: d8.

필요조건

To qualify to become 비전 궁수, a character must fulfill all the following criteria.

Race: Elf or half-elf.

Base 공격 보너스: +6.

특기: Point Blank Shot, Precise Shot, 무기 집중 (longbow or shortbow).

Spells: Ability to cast 1st-level arcane spells.

직업 스킬

비전 궁수’s 직업 스킬 (and the key ability for each skill) are Craft (Int), Hide (Dex). Listen (Wis), Move Silently (Dex), Ride (Dex), Spot (Wis), Survival (Wis), and Use Rope (Dex).

Skill Points at Each Level: 4 + Int modifier.

직업 특성

All of the following are 직업 특성 of 비전 궁수 상위직.

Weapon and Armor Proficiency: 비전 궁수 is proficient with all simple and martial weapons, light armor, medium armor, and shields.

Enhance Arrow (Su): At 1st level, every nonmagical arrow 비전 궁수 nocks and lets fly becomes magical, gaining a +1 enhancement bonus. Unlike magic weapons created by normal means, the archer need not spend experience points or gold pieces to accomplish this task. However, an archer’s magic arrows only function for her. For every two levels the character advances past 1st level in 상위직, the magic arrows she creates gain +1 greater potency (+1 at 1st level, +2 at 3rd level, +3 at 5th level, +4 at 7th level, and +5 at 9th level).

Imbue Arrow (Sp): At 2nd level, 비전 궁수 gains the ability to place an area spell upon an arrow. When the arrow is fired, the spell’s area is centered on where the arrow lands, even if the spell could normally be centered only on the caster. This ability allows the archer to use the bow’s range rather than the spell’s range. It takes a standard action to cast the spell and fire the arrow. The arrow must be fired in the round the spell is cast, or the spell is wasted.

Seeker Arrow (Sp): At 4th level, 비전 궁수 can launch an arrow once per day at a target known to her within range, and the arrow travels to the target, even around corners. Only an unavoidable obstacle or the limit of the arrow’s range prevents the arrow’s flight. This ability negates cover and concealment modifiers, but otherwise the attack is rolled normally. Using this ability is a standard action (and shooting the arrow is part of the action).

Phase Arrow (Sp): At 6th level, 비전 궁수 can launch an arrow once per day at a target known to her within range, and the arrow travels to the target in a straight path, passing through any nonmagical barrier or wall in its way. (Any magical barrier stops the arrow.) This ability negates cover, concealment, and even armor modifiers, but otherwise the attack is rolled normally.

Using this ability is a standard action (and shooting the arrow is part of the action).

Hail of Arrows (Sp): In lieu of her regular attacks, once per day 비전 궁수 of 8th level or higher can fire an arrow at each and every target within range, to a maximum of one target for every 비전 궁수 level she has earned. Each attack uses the archer’s primary 공격 보너스, and each enemy may only be targeted by a single arrow.

Arrow of Death (Sp): At 10th level, 비전 궁수 can create an arrow of death that forces the target, if damaged by the arrow’s attack, to make a DC 20 Fortitude save or be slain immediately. It takes one day to make an arrow of death, and the arrow only functions for 비전 궁수 who created it. The arrow of death lasts no longer than one year, and the archer can only have one such arrow in existence at a time.

비전 도적

Hit Die: d4.

필요조건

To qualify to become 비전 도적, a character must fulfill all of the following criteria.

Alignment: Any nonlawful.

Skills: 문자 해독 7 ranks, 장치 무력화 7 ranks, 탈출 전문가 7 ranks, Knowledge (arcana) 4 ranks.

Spells: Ability to cast mage hand and at least one arcane spell of 3rd level or higher.

Special: Sneak attack +2d6.

직업 스킬

비전 도적’s 직업 스킬 (and the key ability for each skill) are Appraise (Int), Balance (Dex), Bluff (Cha), Climb (Str), Concentration (Con), Craft (Int), 문자 해독 (Int), Diplomacy (Cha), 장치 무력화 (Int), Disguise (Cha), 탈출 전문가 (Dex), 정보 수집 (Cha), Hide (Dex), Jump (Str), Knowledge (all skills taken individually) (Int), Listen (Wis), Move Silently (Dex), Open Lock (Dex), Profession (Wis), 의도 파악 (Wis), Search (Int), 재빠른 손 (Dex), Speak Language (Int), 주문학 (Int), Spot (Wis), Swim (Str), Tumble (Dex), and Use Rope (Dex).

Skill Points at Each Level: 4 + Int modifier.

직업 특기

All of the following are 직업 특성 of 비전 도적 상위직.

Weapon and Armor Proficiency: 비전 도적 gain no proficiency with any weapon or armor.

Spells per Day: When a new 비전 도적 level is gained, the character gains new spells per day as if he had also gained a level in a spellcasting class he belonged to before adding 상위직. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained, except for an increased effective level of spellcasting. If a character had more than one spellcasting class before becoming 비전 도적, he must decide to which class he adds the new level for purposes of determining spells per day.

Ranged Legerdemain: 비전 도적 can perform one of the following 직업 스킬 at a range of 30 feet: 장치 무력화, Open Lock, or 재빠른 손. Working at a distance increases the normal 스킬 판정 DC by 5, and 비전 도적 cannot take 10 on this check. Any object to be manipulated must weigh 5 pounds or less.

비전 도적 can use ranged legerdemain once per day initially, twice per day upon attaining 5th level, and three times per day at 9th level or higher. He can make only one ranged legerdemain 스킬 판정 each day, and only if he has at least 1 rank in the skill being used.

Sneak Attack: This is exactly like the rogue ability of the same name. The extra damage dealt increases by +1d6 every other level (2nd, 4th, 6th, 8th, and 10th). If 비전 도적 gets a sneak 공격 보너스 from another source the bonuses on damage stack.

Impromptu Sneak Attack: Beginning at 3rd level, once per day 비전 도적 can declare one melee or ranged attack he makes to be a sneak attack (the target can be no more than 30 feet distant if the impromptu sneak attack is a ranged attack). The target of an impromptu sneak attack loses any Dexterity bonus to AC, but only against that attack. The power can be used against any target, but creatures that are not subject to critical hits take no extra damage (though they still lose any Dexterity bonus to AC against the attack).

At 7th level, 비전 도적 can use this ability twice per day.

대마법사

Hit Die: d4.

필요조건

To qualify to become 대마법사, a character must fulfill all the following criteria.

 Skills: Knowledge (arcana) 15 ranks, 주문학 15 ranks.

특기: 스킬 집중 (주문학), 주문 집중 in two schools of magic.

Spells: Ability to cast 7th-level arcane spells, knowledge of 5th-level or higher spells from at least five schools.

직업 스킬

대마법사’s 직업 스킬 (and the key ability for each skill) are Concentration (Con), Craft (alchemy) (Int), Knowledge (all skills taken individually) (Int), Profession (Wis), Search (Int), and 주문학 (Int).

 Skill Points at Each Level: 2 + Int modifier.

직업 특기

All the following are 직업 특성 of 대마법사 상위직.

Weapon and Armor Proficiency: 대마법사 gain no proficiency with any weapon or armor.

Spells per Day/Spells Known: When a new 대마법사 level is gained, the character gains new spells per day (and spells known, if applicable) as if he had also gained a level in whatever arcane spellcasting class in which he could cast 7th-level spells before he added 상위직 level. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained. If a character had more than one arcane spellcasting class in which he could cast 7th-level spells before he became 대마법사, he must decide to which class he adds each level of 대마법사 for the purpose of determining spells per day.

High Arcana: 대마법사 gains the opportunity to select 특수 능력 from among those described below by permanently eliminating one existing spell slot (she cannot eliminate a spell slot of higher level than the highest-level spell she can cast). Each 특수 능력 has a minimum required spell slot level, as specified in its description.

대마법사 may choose to eliminate a spell slot of a higher level than that required to gain a type of high arcana.

Arcane Fire (Su): 대마법사 gains the ability to change arcane spell energy into arcane fire, manifesting it as a bolt of raw magical energy. The bolt is a ranged touch attack with long range (400 feet + 40 feet/level of 대마법사) that deals 1d6 points of damage per class level of 대마법사 plus 1d6 points of damage per level of the spell used to create the effect. This ability costs one 9th-level spell slot.

Arcane Reach (Su): 대마법사 can use spells with a range of touch on a target up to 30 feet away. 대마법사 must make a ranged touch attack. Arcane reach can be selected a second time as 특수 능력, in which case the range increases to 60 feet. This ability costs one 7th-level spell slot.

Mastery of Counterspelling: When 대마법사 counterspells a spell, it is turned back upon the caster as if it were fully affected by a spell turning spell. If the spell cannot be affected by spell turning, then it is merely counterspelled. This ability costs one 7th-level spell slot.

Mastery of Elements: 대마법사 can alter an arcane spell when cast so that it utilizes a different element from the one it normally uses. This ability can only alter a spell with the acid, cold, fire, electricity, or sonic descriptor. The spell’s casting time is unaffected. The caster decides whether to alter the spell’s energy type and chooses the new energy type when he begins casting. This ability costs one 8th-level spell slot.

Mastery of Shaping: 대마법사 can alter area and effect spells that use one of the following shapes: burst, cone, cylinder, emanation, or spread. The alteration consists of creating spaces within the spell’s area or effect that are not subject to the spell. The minimum dimension for these spaces is a 5-foot cube. Furthermore, any shapeable spells have a minimum dimension of 5 feet instead of 10 feet. This ability costs one 6th-level spell slot.

Spell Power: This ability increases 대마법사’s effective caster level by +1 (for purposes of determining level-dependent spell variables such as damage dice or range, and caster level checks only). This ability costs one 5th-level spell slot.

Spell-Like Ability: 대마법사 who selects this type of high arcana can use one of her arcane spell slots (other than a slot expended to learn this or any other type of high arcana) to permanently prepare one of her arcane spells as a spell-like ability that can be used twice per day. 대마법사 does not use any components when casting the spell, although a spell that costs XP to cast still does so and a spell with a costly material component instead costs her 10 times that amount in XP. This ability costs one 5th-level spell slot.

The spell-like ability normally uses a spell slot of the spell’s level, although 대마법사 can choose to make a spell modified by a 메타마법 feat into a spell-like ability at the appropriate spell level.

대마법사 may use an available higher-level spell slot in order to use the spell-like ability more often. Using a slot three levels higher than the chosen spell allows her to use the spell-like ability four times per day, and a slot six levels higher lets her use it six times per day.

If spell-like ability is selected more than one time as a high arcana choice, this ability can apply to the same spell chosen the first time (increasing the number of times per day it can be used) or to a different spell.

암살자

Hit Die: d6.

필요조건

To qualify to become 암살자, a character must fulfill all the following criteria.

Alignment: Any evil.

Skills: Disguise 4 ranks, Hide 8 ranks, Move Silently 8 ranks.

Special: The character must kill someone for no other reason than to join 암살자.

직업 스킬

암살자’s 직업 스킬 (and the key ability for each skill) are Balance (Dex), Bluff (Cha), Climb (Str), Craft (Int), 문자 해독 (Int), Diplomacy (Cha), 장치 무력화 (Int), Disguise (Cha), 탈출 전문가 (Dex), Forgery (Int), 정보 수집 (Cha), Hide (Dex), Intimidate (Cha), Jump (Str), Listen (Wis), Move Silently (Dex), Open Lock (Dex), Search (Int), 의도 파악 (Wis), 재빠른 손 (Dex), Spot (Wis), Swim (Str), Tumble (Dex), Use Magic Device (Cha), and Use Rope (Dex).

 Skill Points at Each Level: 4 + Int modifier.

직업 특기

All of the following are 직업 특성 of 암살자 상위직.

Weapon and Armor Proficiency: 암살자 are proficient with the crossbow (hand, light, or heavy), dagger (any type), dart, rapier, sap, shortbow (normal and composite), and short sword. 암살자 are proficient with light armor but not with shields.

Sneak Attack: This is exactly like the rogue ability of the same name. The extra damage dealt increases by +1d6 every other level (2nd, 4th, 6th, 8th, and 10th). If 암살자 gets a sneak 공격 보너스 from another source the bonuses on damage stack.

즉사 공격: If 암살자 studies his victim for 3 rounds and then makes a sneak attack with a melee weapon that successfully deals damage, the sneak attack has the additional effect of possibly either paralyzing or killing the target (암살자’s choice). While studying the victim, 암살자 can undertake other actions so long as his attention stays focused on the target and the target does not detect 암살자 or recognize 암살자 as an enemy. If the victim of such an attack fails a Fortitude save (DC 10 + 암살자’s class level + 암살자’s Int modifier) against the kill effect, she dies. If the 내성 굴림 fails against the paralysis effect, the victim is rendered helpless and unable to act for 1d6 rounds plus 1 round per level of 암살자. If the victim’s 내성 굴림 succeeds, the attack is just a normal sneak attack. Once 암살자 has completed the 3 rounds of study, he must make 즉사 공격 within the next 3 rounds.

If 즉사 공격 is attempted and fails (the victim makes her save) or if 암살자 does not launch the attack within 3 rounds of completing the study, 3 new rounds of study are required before he can attempt another 즉사 공격.

Poison Use: 암살자 are trained in the use of poison and never risk accidentally poisoning themselves when applying poison to a blade.

Spells: Beginning at 1st level, 암살자 gains the ability to cast a number of arcane spells. To cast a spell, 암살자 must have an Intelligence score of at least 10 + the spell’s level, so 암살자 with an Intelligence of 10 or lower cannot cast these spells. 암살자 bonus spells are based on Intelligence, and 내성 굴림 against these spells have a DC of 10 + spell level + 암살자’s Intelligence bonus. When 암살자 gets 0 spells per day of a given spell level he gains only the bonus spells he would be entitled to based on his Intelligence score for that spell level.

암살자’s spell list appears below. 암살자 casts spells just as a bard does.

Upon reaching 6th level, at every even-numbered level after that (8th and 10th), 암살자 can choose to learn a new spell in place of one he already knows. The new spell’s level must be the same as that of the spell being exchanged, and it must be at least two levels lower than the highest-level 암살자 spell 암살자 can cast. 암살자 may swap only a single spell at any given level, and must choose whether or not to swap the spell at the same time that he gains new spells known for that level.

Save Bonus against Poison: 암살자 gains a natural 내성 굴림 bonus to all poisons gained at 2nd level that increases by +1 for every two additional levels 암살자 gains.

Uncanny Dodge (Ex): Starting at 2nd level, 암살자 retains his Dexterity bonus to AC (if any) regardless of being caught flat-footed or struck by an invisible attacker. (He still loses any Dexterity bonus to AC if immobilized.)

If a character gains uncanny dodge from a second class the character automatically gains improved uncanny dodge (see below).

Improved Uncanny Dodge (Ex): At 5th level, 암살자 can no longer be flanked, since he can react to opponents on opposite sides of him as easily as he can react to a single attacker. This defense denies rogues the ability to use flank attacks to sneak attack 암살자. The exception to this defense is that a rogue at least four levels higher than 암살자 can flank him (and thus sneak attack him).

If a character gains uncanny dodge (see above) from a second class the character automatically gains improved uncanny dodge, and the levels from those classes stack to determine the minimum rogue level required to flank the character.

Hide in Plain Sight (Su): At 8th level, 암살자 can use the Hide skill even while being observed. As long as he is within 10 feet of some sort of shadow, 암살자 can hide himself from view in the open without having anything to actually hide behind.

He cannot, however, hide in his own shadow.

암살자 주문 목록

암살자 choose their spells from the following list:

1st Level: disguise self, detect poison, feather fall, ghost sound, jump, obscuring mist, sleep, true strike.

2nd Level: alter self, cat’s grace, darkness, fox’s cunning, illusory script, 투명상태, pass without trace, spider climb, undetectable alignment.

3rd Level: deep slumber, deeper darkness, false life, magic circle against good, misdirection, nondetection.

4th Level: clairaudience/clairvoyance, dimension door, freedom of movement, glibness, greater 투명상태, locate creature, modify memory, poison.

검은경비병

Hit Die: d10.

필요조건

To qualify to become 검은경비병, a character must fulfill all the following criteria.

Alignment: Any evil.

Base 공격 보너스: +6.

 Skills: Hide 5 ranks, Knowledge (religion) 2 ranks.

특기: Cleave, 향상된 무기 파괴, 강한 공격.

Special: The character must have made peaceful contact with an evil outsider who was summoned by him or someone else.

직업 스킬

검은경비병’s 직업 스킬 (and the key ability for each skill) are Concentration (Con), Craft (Int), Diplomacy (Cha), 동물 조련 (Cha), Heal (Wis), Hide (Dex), Intimidate (Cha), Knowledge (religion) (Int), Profession (Wis), and Ride (Dex).

Skill Points at Each Level: 2 + Int modifier.

직업 특기

All of the following are 직업 특성 of 검은경비병 상위직.

Weapon and Armor Proficiency: 검은경비병 are proficient with all simple and martial weapons, with all types of armor, and with shields.

Aura of Evil (Ex): The power of 검은경비병’s aura of evil (see the detect evil spell) is equal to his class level plus his cleric level, if any.

Detect Good (Sp): At will, 검은경비병 can use detect good as a spell-like ability, duplicating the effect of the detect good spell.

Poison Use: 검은경비병 are skilled in the use of poison and never risk accidentally poisoning themselves when applying poison to a blade.

Dark Blessing (Su): 검은경비병 applies his Charisma modifier (if positive) as a bonus on all 내성 굴림.

Spells: 검은경비병 has the ability to cast a small number of divine spells. To cast 검은경비병 spell, 검은경비병 must have a Wisdom score of at least 10 + the spell’s level, so 검은경비병 with a Wisdom of 10 or lower cannot cast these spells.

검은경비병 bonus spells are based on Wisdom, and 내성 굴림 against these spells have a DC of 10 + spell level + 검은경비병’s Wisdom modifier. When 검은경비병 gets 0 spells per day of a given spell level he gains only the bonus spells he would be entitled to based on his Wisdom score for that spell level. 검은경비병’s spell list appears below. 검은경비병 has access to any spell on the list and can freely choose which to prepare, just as a cleric. 검은경비병 prepares and casts spells just as a cleric does (though 검은경비병 cannot spontaneously cast cure or inflict spells).

Defensive Stance:  When he adopts a defensive stance, a defender gains phenomenal strength and durability, but he cannot move from the spot he is defending. He gains +2 to Strength, +4 to Constitution, a +2 resistance bonus on all saves, and a +4 dodge bonus to AC. The increase in Constitution increases the defender’s 체력 by 2 points per level, but these 체력 go away at the end of the defensive stance when the Constitution score drops back 4 points. A defensive stance lasts for a number of rounds equal to 3 + the character’s (newly improved) Constitution modifier. A defender may end his defensive stance voluntarily prior to this limit. At the end of the defensive stance, the defender is winded and takes a –2 penalty to Strength for the duration of that encounter. A defender can only use his defensive stance a certain number of times per day as determined by his level (see Table: 드워프 수호자). Using the defensive stance takes no time itself, but a defender can only do so during his action.

If a character gains uncanny dodge from a second class, the character automatically gains improved uncanny dodge (see below).

Trap Sense (Ex): At 4th level, 드워프 수호자 gains a +1 bonus on Reflex saves made to avoid traps and a +1 dodge bonus to AC against attacks by traps. At 8th level, these bonuses rise to +2. These bonuses stack with trap sense bonuses gained from other classes.

Damage Reduction (Ex): At 6th level, 드워프 수호자 gains damage reduction. Subtract 3 points from the damage 드워프 수호자 takes each time he is dealt damage. At 10th level, this damage reduction rises to 6/–. Damage reduction can reduce damage to 0 but not below 0.

Improved Uncanny Dodge (Ex): At 6th level, 드워프 수호자 can no longer be flanked. This defense denies rogues the ability to use flank attacks to sneak attack 드워프 수호자.

The exception to this defense is that a rogue at least four levels higher than 드워프 수호자 can flank him (and thus sneak attack him).

If a character gains uncanny dodge (see above) from a second class the character automatically gains improved uncanny dodge, and the levels from those classes stack to determine the minimum rogue level required to flank the character.

Mobile Defense (Ex): At 8th level, 드워프 수호자 can adjust his position while maintaining a defensive stance. While in a defensive stance, he can take one 5-foot step each round without losing the benefit of the stance.

Aquatic: You gain a +4 competence bonus on Swim checks, or a +10-foot bonus to your swim speed if you have one. You gain a +1 insight bonus on attack and damage rolls against aquatic creatures.

Hills: You gain a +4 competence bonus on Listen checks. You gain a +1 insight bonus on attack and damage rolls against hills creatures.

Marsh: You have a +4 competence bonus on Move Silently checks. You gain a +1 insight bonus on attack and damage rolls against marsh creatures.

Mountains: You gain a +4 competence bonus on Climb checks, or a +10- foot bonus to your climb speed if you have one. You gain a +1 insight bonus on attack and damage rolls against mountain creatures.

Plains: You have a +4 competence bonus on Spot checks. You gain a +1 insight bonus on attack and damage rolls against plains creatures.

Underground: You have 60-foot 암흑시야, or 120-foot 암흑시야 if you already had 암흑시야 from another source. You gain a +1 insight bonus on attack and damage rolls against underground creatures.

Fiery (Planar): This kind of planar terrain mastery provides you with resistance to fire 20. You gain a +1 insight bonus on attack and damage rolls against outsiders and elementals with the fire subtype.

Weightless (Planar): You gain a +30-foot bonus to your fly speed on planes with no gravity or subjective gravity. You gain a +1 insight on attack and damage rolls against creatures native to the Astral Plane, the Elemental Plane of Air, and the 무형의 Plane.

Cold (Planar): This kind of planar terrain mastery provides you with resistance to cold 20. You gain a +1 insight bonus on attack and damage rolls against outsiders and elementals with the cold subtype.

Shifting (Planar): You instinctively anticipate shifts in the reality of the plane that bring you closer to your destination, giving you the spell-like ability to use dimension door (as the spell cast at your character level) once every 1d4 rounds. You gain a +1 insight bonus on attack and damage rolls against outsiders and elementals native to a shifting plane.

Aligned (Planar): You have the instinctive ability to mimic the dominant alignment of the plane. You have the dominant alignment of the plane with regard to magic, but your behavior and any alignment-related 직업 특성 you have are unaffected.

Cavernous (Planar): You gain tremorsense with a 30-foot range.

Other (Planar): If other planes are in use additional Planar Terrains can be created.

All of the following are features of 그림자춤꾼 상위직.

Weapon and Armor Proficiency: 그림자춤꾼 are proficient with the club, crossbow (hand, light, or heavy), dagger (any type), dart, mace, morningstar, quarterstaff, rapier, sap, shortbow (normal and composite), and short sword. 그림자춤꾼 are proficient with light armor but not with shields.

Hide in Plain Sight (Su): 그림자춤꾼 can use the Hide skill even while being observed. As long as she is within 10 feet of some sort of shadow, 그림자춤꾼 can hide herself from view in the open without anything to actually hide behind. She cannot, however, hide in her own shadow.

Evasion (Ex): At 2nd level, 그림자춤꾼 gains evasion. If exposed to any effect that normally allows her to attempt a Reflex 내성 굴림 for half damage, she takes no damage with a successful 내성 굴림. The evasion ability can only be used if 그림자춤꾼 is wearing light armor or no armor.

암흑시야 (Su): At 2nd level, 그림자춤꾼 can see in the dark as though she were permanently under the effect of a 암흑시야 spell.

Uncanny Dodge (Ex): Starting at 2nd level, 그림자춤꾼 retains her Dexterity bonus to AC (if any) regardless of being caught flat-footed or struck by an invisible attacker. (She still loses any Dexterity bonus to AC if immobilized.)

If a character gains uncanny dodge from a second class, the character automatically gains improved uncanny dodge (see below).

Shadow Illusion (Sp): When 그림자춤꾼 reaches 3rd level, she can create visual illusions. This ability’s effect is identical to that of the arcane spell silent image and may be employed once per day.

Summon Shadow (Su): At 3rd level, 그림자춤꾼 can summon a shadow, an undead shade. Unlike a normal shadow, this shadow’s alignment matches that of 그림자춤꾼, and the creature cannot create spawn. The summoned shadow cannot be turned, rebuked, or commanded by any third party. This shadow serves as a companion to 그림자춤꾼 and can communicate intelligibly with 그림자춤꾼. Every third level gained by 그림자춤꾼 adds +2 HD (and the requisite base attack and base save bonus increases) to her shadow companion.

 If a shadow companion is destroyed, or 그림자춤꾼 chooses to dismiss it, 그림자춤꾼 must attempt a DC 15 Fortitude save. If the 내성 굴림 fails, 그림자춤꾼 loses 200 experience points per 그림자춤꾼 level. A successful 내성 굴림 reduces the loss by half, to 100 XP per 상위직 level. 그림자춤꾼’s XP total can never go below 0 as the result of a shadow’s dismissal or destruction. A destroyed or dismissed shadow companion cannot be replaced for 30 days.

Shadow Jump (Su): At 4th level, 그림자춤꾼 gains the ability to travel between shadows as if by means of a dimension door spell. The limitation is that the magical transport must begin and end in an area with at least some shadow. 그림자춤꾼 can jump up to a total of 20 feet each day in this way; this may be a single jump of 20 feet or two jumps of 10 feet each. Every two levels higher than 4th, the distance 그림자춤꾼 can jump each day doubles (40 feet at 6th, 80 feet at 8th, and 160 feet at 10th). This amount can be split among many jumps, but each one, no matter how small, counts as a 10-foot increment.

Defensive Roll (Ex): Starting at 5th level, once per day, when 그림자춤꾼 would be reduced to 0 체력 or less by damage in combat (from a weapon or other blow, not a spell or 특수 능력), she can attempt to roll with the damage. She makes a Reflex 내성 굴림 (DC = damage dealt) and, if successful, takes only half damage from the blow. She must be aware of the attack and able to react to it in order to execute her defensive roll. If she is in a situation that would deny her any Dexterity bonus to AC, she can’t attempt a defensive roll.

Improved Uncanny Dodge (Ex): At 5th level, 그림자춤꾼 can no longer be flanked. This defense denies rogues the ability to use flank attacks to sneak attack 그림자춤꾼. The exception to this defense is that a rogue at least four levels higher than 그림자춤꾼 can flank her (and thus sneak attack her).

If a character gains uncanny dodge (see above) from a second class the character automatically gains improved uncanny dodge, and the levels from those classes stack to determine the minimum rogue level required to flank the character.

Slippery Mind (Ex): At 7th level, if 그림자춤꾼 is affected by an enchantment and fails her 내성 굴림, 1 round later she can attempt her 내성 굴림 again. She only gets this one extra chance to succeed at her 내성 굴림. If it fails as well, the spell’s effects occur normally.

Improved Evasion (Ex): This ability, gained at 10th level, works like evasion (see above). 그림자춤꾼 takes no damage at all on successful 내성 굴림 against attacks that allow a Reflex 내성 굴림 for half damage. What’s more, she takes only half damage even if she fails her 내성 굴림.

Improved Ally: When 서마터지스트 casts a planar ally spell (including the lesser and greater versions), he makes a Diplomacy check to convince the creature to aid him for a reduced payment. If 서마터지스트’s Diplomacy check adjusts the creature’s attitude to helpful the creature will work for 50% of the standard fee, as long as the task is one that is not against its nature.

서마터지스트’s improved ally 직업 특성 only works when the planar ally shares at least one aspect of alignment with 서마터지스트.

서마터지스트 can have only one such ally at a time, but he may bargain for tasks from other planar allies normally.

Augment Summoning: At 2nd level, 서마터지스트 gains the 증강 소환 feat.

Extended Summoning: At 3rd level and higher, all spells from the summoning subschool that 서마터지스트 casts have their durations doubled, as if the 주문 시간 연장 feat had been applied to them. The levels of the summoning spells don’t change, however. This ability stacks with the effect of the 주문 시간 연장 feat, which does change the spell’s level.

Contingent Conjuration: A 4th-level 서마터지스트 can prepare a summoning or calling spell ahead of time to be triggered by some other event. This functions as described for the contingency spell, including having 서마터지스트 cast the summoning or calling spell beforehand. The spell is cast instantly when the trigger event occurs.

The conditions needed to bring the spell into effect must be clear, although they can be general. If complicated or convoluted condition as are prescribed, the contingent conjuration may fail when triggered. The conjuration spell occurs based solely on the stated conditions, regardless of whether 서마터지스트 wants it to, although most conjurations can be dismissed normally. 서마터지스트 can have only one contingent conjuration active at a time.

Planar Cohort: A 5th-level 서마터지스트 can use any of the planar ally spells to call a creature to act as his cohort. The called creature serves loyally and well as long as 서마터지스트 continues to advance a cause important to the creature.

To call a planar cohort, 서마터지스트 must cast the relevant spell, paying the XP costs normally. It takes an offering of 1,000 gp x the HD of the creature to convince it to serve as a planar cohort, and the improved ally 직업 특성 can’t be used to reduce or eliminate this cost. The planar cohort can’t have more Hit Dice than 서마터지스트 has, and must have an ECL no higher than 서마터지스트’s character level –2.

서마터지스트 can have only one planar cohort at a time, but he can continue to make agreements with other called creatures normally. A planar cohort replaces 서마터지스트’s existing cohort, if he has one by virtue of the Leadership feat.
